titles.title: Honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of civil rights leader J.L. Chestnut, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
10/3/2008--Introduced.
Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives to the surviving family of J.L. Chestnut, Jr. Honors the life of J.L. Chestnut, Jr., as a recognized leader and powerful advocate for justice and equality.
